title: Echoes From The Heart
description: The little town of Waldo, Illinois, was Brenna McShane's whole world, and that was the way she liked it. She had her family, her business and her work with disadvantaged children. What Brenna didn't need was her ex-husband, Luke, to come barging back into her life!Stock-car racing had been Luke's life, and he'd never seemed to have time for Brenna. She'd spent many long, lonely nights waiting for him to come home and only recently had been able to put the heartache of their young love behind her. Now Luke was back in Waldo, and he brought with him all the passion and promise of a love that was meant tolast forever....
author: Kelly Jamison
